show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host, Dr. <!--more--> Eugene Zampierion, ND, MH, www.drznaturally.com, interviews author Dave DeWitt.
 DAVE DEWITT is a food historian and expert on chile peppers, spices, and spicy foods.
He has authored more than forty books about food and gardening.
DeWitt has appeared on CNN, Today, CBS Sunday Morning, The Martha Stewart Show, and has been featured in The New York Times, The New Yorker, Los Angeles Times, USA Today, Smithsonian, and more than 200 newspapers across the country.
On todays show, we will feature Dave’s Book, Growing Medical Marijuana.
Outlining the ins and outs of marijuana cultivation in the states in which it’s legal, this guide also presents easy-to-master approaches to fertilizing, pruning, controlling pests, maximizing flower production, cloning, producing your own seeds, and more.
Contact: http://www.dave-dewitt.com or daved@fiery-foods.
com.
